amendment.description: An amendment nubmered 12 printed in Part B of House Report 116-253 to require the Federal Election Commission to include in its report to Congress an analysis of disinformation campaigns focused on depressing turnout among African-American and other minority communities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cunningham amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Cunningham.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cunningham amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
